1. Push Notification Support.
2. Manual Alarm Support.
3. Increased PTZ support: Focus, Iris, Preset & Cruise.
4. 4Ch Synchronized playback (From same device)
5. Increased search range to up to 30 days back
6. Local recording supports sound recording.
7. Event search added for playback
8. Direct preview of device from the Server List.
9. Number of supported devices increased to 32
11.Share snapshots by email.
12. Stability improvement and bug fixes

1. Direct Playback from IPC SD Card . (IPC version 4.2.1 and above).
2. Cloud Upgrade Push Notification Support
3. Improved Device Management, Remote Playback, Live and File Management interfaces.

5. Server List will show indication for wrong login credentials.

New Features:
1. Object detection analytics support. (For Eye-Sight v2 & Smart Sight Cameras)
2. NVR v1.4.3 Support
3. Added 9 and 16 channels playback split modes
4. Added notifications for devices running old FW.

Improvement and bug fixes:
1. Improved stability for iOS 13
2. Added support for the device name with special characters “-_”

1) Playback backup directly to your mobile phone.
2) Remote cloud upgrade support (for supporting 1.4.4 devices).
3) NAT2.0 platform support.
4) Fixed compatibility issues with some iPhone 12 devices.
5) Fixed DDNS issues with iOS 14.
6) Minor improvements and bug fixes.
